lessons.name: Setting up the environment
lessons.description: You will learn how to set up your computer to begin creating HTML files.

lessons.name: Introduction to HTML
lessons.description: You will learn the basics of HTML and how to create a simple HTML page using the HTML element tags.

lessons.name: Text Formatting
lessons.description: You will learn how to format text in HTML utilizing various HTML tags.

lessons.name: Lists
lessons.description: You will learn how to create lists to organize your content.

lessons.name: Links and Images
lessons.description: You will learn how to create links to other pages and how to add images to your page.

lessons.name: Basic Styling
lessons.description: You will learn how to style your HTML page using the style attribute.

lessons.name: Forms
lessons.description: You will learn how to create forms to collect data from your users.

lessons.name: Quiz
lessons.description: Test your knowledge on what you have learned so far.
